typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Description as string,
		{LOB Sub-Category} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCPopulationCategoryCodes
SRCPopulationCategoryCodes sink(input(
		PopulationCategoryCode_Key as integer,
		PopulationCategoryCode as string,
		PopulationCategoryCodeDesc as string,
		LineofBusinessCodeCatCode as string,
		LineofBusinessCodeSubCatCode as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PopulationCategoryCode = Code,
		PopulationCategoryCodeDesc = Description,
		LineofBusinessCodeSubCatCode = {LOB Sub-Category}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TRDimPopulationCategoryCodes
